entry.title: Multi-Benne Stain Stick
entry.summary:
Vendor: NOTO Botanics
Type: Lip Stain
Price: 18.50

LIPS + CHEEKS + EYES

Multi-use color that builds, nourishes, and repairs. Now color is not only beautiful, but also food for the skin and senses!

Ono Ono: A beautiful burnt peach hue

Oscillate: A beautiful red hue

MULTI-USE: Apply anywhere desired for pop of natural flush.

Ingredients

*Olive Fruit Oil, Peppermint, *Coconut Oil, *Shea Butter, *Jojoba Seed Oil, Rosehip Seed Oil, Vitamin E, Sunflower Seed Oil, *Neem Seed Oil, *Rosemary Leaf Extract, *Sustainable (RSPO Certified) Palm Fruit Oil, *Sunflower Seed OiL, Iron Oxide, Titanium Dioxide, Candelilla Wax * Organic

Directions

Twist up and apply this product anywhere for a soft wash of shine and subtle shimmer. Use on the eyelids for a tinted eye gloss. Use alone or add top of lipliner. Use as a base for powder eyeshadow.

entry.title: Tinted Balms
entry.summary:
Vendor: Olio E Osso
Type: Skin Balm
Price: 28.00

Olio E Osso's most essential, versatile product is nourishing on lips and cheeks, soothing on skin and hair, and adored by all who discover them. Swipe across lips or slide over cheekbones for a subtle glow.

No. 0 Netto - This natural menthol balm is useful all over the body. It tingles on the lips, clears nasal and chest congestion, and stimulates tired temples.

No. 1 Clear - Olio E Osso's most versatile balm is useful all over the body, its emollient texture melts into lips, tames split ends, flyaway hair, stray eyebrows and beards, and conditions cuticles, elbows and dry patches.

No. 2 French Melon - Perfectly pigmented balm for a blush of color on the lips or cheeks.

No. 3 Crimson - A sheer touch of classic crimson to brighten and enrich your lips and cheeks.

No. 4 Berry - Soft and luminous, this transparent aubergine stain adds depth to lips and highlights cheeks.

No. 5 Currant - Enhance your natural beauty with a perfect wash of warmth on lips and cheeks.

No. 6 Bronze - Never glittery, this is Olio E Osso's first balm with a hint of shimmer. Use as you would a bronzer or highlighter for a natural glow.

No. 7 Blush Shimmer - Slightly iridescent, this light pink shimmer can be worn on its own for subtle brightening on lips or cheeks. Great layered over any of Olio E Osso's other tinted balms for a deeper look.

No. 8 Persimmon - Rich, deep and toasty orange, this balm will give your cheeks and lips a subtle wash of warmth that is stunning on its own or layered with other balms.

No. 9 Spring - A breezy take on a spring bloom to add a bit of brightness to your lips and cheeks.

No. 10 Tea Rose - Graceful and grounded, this beautiful rose hue will enhance your natural glow.

No. 11 Féte - A truly beautiful celebration of light. Féte is perfect for layering, highlighting or wearing on its own.

No. 12 Plum - Warm and rich with a slight shimmer of gold, use Plum to deepen and enhance lips and cheeks.

No. 13 Poppy - A lovely red with subtle shining vibrance, brightens the lips and cheeks.

• Made by hand in small batches in Portland, Oregon

• .35 oz

Ingredients

No. 0 Netto: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Menthol (Natural), Eucalyptus Radiata (Eucalyptus) Leaf Oil

No. 1 Clear: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil

No. 2 French Melon: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Red Lake 21 (CI 45380)

No. 3 Crimson: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Carmine (CI 75470)

No. 4 Berry: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Carmine (CI 75470), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxide (CI 77499)

No. 5 Currant: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Iron Oxide (CI 77491)

No. 6 Bronze: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Mica, Iron Oxide (CI 77491)

No. 7 Blush Shimmer: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Mica, Carmine (CI 75470), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)

No. 8 Persimmon: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Annatto (CI 75120), Carmine (CI 75470)

No. 9 Spring: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Carmine (CI 75470)

No. 10 Tea Rose: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Iron Oxide (CI 77492), Carmine (CI 75470)

No. 11 Féte: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Synthetic Fluorophlogopite, Tin Oxide (CI 77861), Limonene, Linalool, Citral

No. 12 Plum: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Mica (CI 77019), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Iron Oxide (CI 77491) Carmine (CI 75470), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide (77861), Silica, Limonene, Linalool, Citral

No. 13 Poppy: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Mica (CI 77019) Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Carmine (CI 75470), Iron Oxide ( CI 77491), Limonene, Linalool, Citral

Directions

No. 0 Netto: Apply to lips, chest, temples and sore muscles.

No. 1 Clear: Apply to lips, hair and dry skin.

No. 2-5, 7-13: Apply to lips and cheeks.

No. 6 Bronze: Apply to lips, cheeks and skin. Great layered over any of our other tinted balms for a deeper look.

entry.title: Pressed Blush
entry.summary:
Vendor: NU Evolution
Type: Blush
Price: 28.00

This silky pressed blush formula has buildable color and pure ingredients.

Shades:

Soho: Soho is a beautiful rose hue, adding the perfect amount of pink to your cheeks.

• Made WITHOUT: Parabens, Artificial Dyes, BHA, Bismuth Oxychloride, Dimethicone, Mineral Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Phthalates, Propylene Glycol, Sulphates / Sulphites, Synthetic Fragrances, Talc, Triclosan.

entry.title: Rice Powder Blush & Bronzer (Roma)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ere Perez
Type: Blush
Price: 34.00

A pressed rice powder blush & bronzer for everyone! Made with non-GMO rice for a silky texture that blends beautifully on clean skin or over foundation. Universal duo shades that suits all complexions, adding healthy natural color to your face. Works great as a multitasking powder to apply as a contour, eyeshadow, lip color and all over the face to even skin tone. Its breathable formula doesn’t clog pores and even helps to absorb impurities.

One of Ere Perez's most-loved products, packaged in a sleek compact. Best applied with their eco vegan blush & bronze brush.

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Cruelty free

Ingredients

mica, native rice (oryza sativa) starch, octyldodecyl stearoyl stearate, zinc stearate, boron nitride, isostearyl neopentanoate, native corn (zea mays) starch, sunflower (helianthus annuus) seed oil, rosemary (rosmarinus officinalis) leaf extract, phenylpropanol, caprylyl glycol, decylene glycol, silica, tin oxide. May contain + /- iron oxides, CI 77891.

Directions

Ere Perez's natural powders can be worn on a clean face or over foundation. To apply, take the Ere Perez eco vegan blush & bronzer brush and swish over both sides of the color palette. This will give a perfect blend of natural color. Shake off excess powder before applying to the cheeks. Next, add the colored powder to other areas such as the eyelids, forehead, chin. Use careful application here for a subtle look. These powders are made to be layered – you may like one application or more, depending on your desired look.

entry.title: Carrot Color Pot
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ere Perez
Type: Cheek & Lip Tint
Price: 32.00

This multitasking balm adds instant color to the cheeks without the use of any animal derivatives - making it the perfect vegan cheek & lip balm. It also features an array of skin-healthy ingredients such as carrots and is chock-full of antioxidants, helping to keep skin soft + hydrated.

A small pot of goodness that fits in your pocket with a practical mirror lid for touch ups so you can lift your look anytime, anywhere.

• .22 oz / 6.5 g

Ingredients

hydrogenated olive (olea europea) oil, candelilla (euphorbia cerifera) wax, ozokerite, caprylic/capric triglyceride, avocado (persea gratissima) oil, carrot (daucus carota sativa) oil, tocopheryl acetate (vitamin E). May contain +/– Iron oxides, CI77019, CI77891.

Directions

Apply balm with Ere Perez's eco vegan multipurpose brush directly to the cheeks in round movements, blending as little or as much as you like. Repeat for deeper color. For lips, apply with the eco vegan concealer & lip brush over top and bottom lip and rub lips together.

entry.title: Nudist Multi-Use Duo
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Makeup
Price: 25.00

This magic, multi-tasking vegan cosmetic adds gorgeous sheer, natural color to cheeks, lips, and eyes. Rich in skin-soothing organic aloe + antioxidants to hydrate and improve overall skin quality. The creamy formula has a satiny smooth, weightless texture – free from all harsh, artificial chemicals and petroleum.

Enjoy premium, high-performance organic botanicals that provide weightless all-day wear with no creasing.

• Blush, eyeshadow and lip stain all-in-one

• Flattering nude shades for all ages and skin tones

• Quick & easy application; blends beautifully with fingertips

• Vegan, Hypoallergenic, Cruelty Free & Noncomedogenic

• EWG Verified for non-toxic health and safety

Free From: Parabens, Gluten, GMOs, Phthalates, Sulfates, Fragrance, Pheonoxyethanol, Dimethicone, PEG, Propylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Lead, Mineral Oil, Talc.

Ingredients

Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Candelilla (Euphorbia Cerifera) Wax, Copernica Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax*, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Shorea Robusta Resin, Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit*, Silica, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf*, Matricaria Chamomilla (Chamomile) Flowers*, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf*, Tocopherol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethyhexylglycerin, +/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxide, Red 7

Directions

Warm and blend product onto eyes, cheeks, or lips using fingertips, or W3LL PEOPLE Foundation Brush

entry.title: Cream Color
entry.summary:
Vendor: 1/1
Type: Makeup
Price: 36.00

A creamy touch of sun meets a lively glow!

• 94% Natural : 82% Organic

• 4 Shades: Rare Poppy, Live Umber, Chiaroscuro, Alizarin Rose

Organic Orange Peel Butter: A brightening ingredient rich in Vitamin C to enhance skin's natural glow.

Organic Sunflower Oil: A lightweight oil known to moisturize and protect skin with a powerful dose of Vitamin E.

Organic Sesame Oil: A natural skin hydrator high in linoleic acid to boost radiance and seal in essential moisture.

Organic Cocoa Butter: A natural skin soother high in essential fatty acids to help neutralize free radicals and soften skin.

Ingredients

Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil*, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil*, Triisostearyl Citrate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax*, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)*, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Zinc Stearate, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Coco-caprylate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Wax, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower/Leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Steam Extract, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Flower Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxide (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)

Directions

Morning movement gives skin a natural blush. Boost it with a touch of bronze for warmth and highlight where you want to glow.

entry.title: Lip + Cheek Tint
entry.summary:
Vendor: Evelyn Iona
Type: lip and cheek tint
Price: 20.00

Inspired by the men that make us blush! Let this Glycerin-based (natural moisturizer that helps sensitive, acne prone skin heal) paraben, synthetics, preservatives and cruelty free blush caress your cheeks and lips, when he can't.

• Natural + Organic

• Vegan, Cruelty free, Gluten free

• Paraben free, Sulfate free

• Made in the USA

• .11 oz / 3 g

Ingredients

*Ricinus Communis (Castor) Oil, *Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Microcrystalline Wax, Glycerine, Stearic Acid, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Isostearyl Palmitate, Xanthan Gum,* Helianthus Annuus ( Sunflower) Seed Oil,*Origanum Vulgare (Oregano) Leaf Extract, *Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract, *Cinnamomum Zeylancum (Cinnamon) Bark Extract, *Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, *Lavandula Angustfolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, *Hydrastis Canadensis (Goldenseal) Root Extract, Vanilla Planifolia.[+/- May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77492, 77499), Titanium Dioxide (C177891) Mica (CI 77019)] *Certified Organic

Directions

entry.title: Rose + Vanilla Tinted Lip Blush
entry.summary:
Vendor: FIG+YARROW
Type: Lip Treatment
Price: 12.00

F+Y Rose & Vanilla Lip Blush is a delicately flavored rose-tinted blushing balm for lovelier lips. Highly nourishing, protective and anti-oxidant organic plant oils, butters and waxes are naturally tinted with alkanet root and kissed with a touch of pure rose and vanilla essential oils for a very special lip treat.

Formulated WITHOUT: Parabens, Sulfates, Artificial Fragrances, Silicones, Synthetic Dyes, Artificial Colors, Petrochemicals, & Animal Testing

Ingredients

Persea gratissima (avocado) oil*†, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter*†, Rosa mosqueta (rosehip) oil*, Prunus domestica (plum) kernel oil†, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter*, beeswax*, Punica granatum (pomegranate) oil*, Copernica cerifera (carnauba) wax*, Batschia canescens (alkanet) root, Tocopherol (vitamin E, non-GMO), essential oils of: Vanilla planifolia (vanilla), Rosa damascena (rose). *certified organic †virgin

Directions

Apply to lips as needed.

entry.title: Pure Rice Powder Blush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ere Perez
Type: Blush
Price: 31.00

Add pure color to your face with these super-fine pressed powders, superbly formulated with rice for smooth adherence and silken texture. Reduces the appearance of tiredness and drab, as well as dull skin, while staying breathable, as it doesn’t clog pores. Packaged in a sleek compact that fits in your palm.

My Blush - Universal Blush

Rose Tones - Pink-terracotta hues

Bondi Blush - Coral/peach pink blush duo

• Free of harsh chemicals such as parabens, phthalates, propylene glycol, paraffin, lead, nanoparticles and more.

• Compatible with even the most sensitive skin types

• Never tested on animals

Ingredients

native rice (oryza sativa) starch, mica, zinc stearate, caprylic /capric triglyceride, isoamyl laurate, triheptanoin, potassium sorbate, May contain: +/- iron oxides, CI77891.

Directions

These stunning natural powders can be worn alone or over foundation. Take the Ere Perez purpose-designed BLUSH & BRONZER BRUSH and swish it in the colour palette, over both sides. This will give a great natural color. Shake off excess powder before applying to the cheeks. Next, you can add extra color to the eyelids and perhaps even a light dusting on forehead/chin with the bronzer. Take care with these areas; you just want a faint hint of colour here. These pure powders are made to be layered – you may like one application, or three, depending on your mood or the season!

entry.title: Clever Carrot Cheek & Lip Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ere Perez
Type: Blush
Price: 23.00

Harness the natural goodness of carrots while adding vibrant color without the fuss of brushes or applicators. This easy, fuss-free coverage keeps skin soft and hydrated, and can also be used on lips. Simply dip your finger in and smooth over cheeks / lips. Ultra-waterproof for the beach, gym, office or active lifestyles, and small enough to fit in your pocket or wallet.

Healthy - A caramel cream blush with a light tan colour, great for daytime.

Happy - A crimson cream blush that is divine on darker skin tones.

Harmless - A pink cream blush that is fabulous on fair skin tones.

Holy - A Plum-colored cream blush that is a wonderful shade for winter.

• Free of harsh chemicals such as parabens, phthalates, propylene glycol, paraffin, lead, nanoparticles and more.

• Compatible with even the most sensitive skin types

• Never tested on animals

Ingredients

hydrogenated olive (olea europea) oil, candelilla (euphorbia cerifera) wax, caprylic/capric triglyceride, ozokerite , avocado (persea gratissima) oil, carrot (daucus carota sativa) oil, tocopheryl acetate (vitamin e). May contain +/- iron oxides, CI 77019, CI77891.

Directions

Simply dip your finger in and smooth over cheeks / lips.

entry.title: Beetroot Cheek & Lip Tint
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ere Perez
Type: Cheek & Lip Tint
Price: 25.00

Long-lasting vibrant color tints for lips + cheeks featuring a water-based formula with beetroot extract, which nourishes + hydrates skin. Rich in antioxidants, this healthy tint acts as a natural blush/stain and lasts all day. Ere Perez's most popular 2-in-1 product, designed with an easy applicator for fuss-free natural color.

Joy - Bright Cherry Red

Fun - Bright Fuchsia Pink

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Cruelty free

Ingredients

Fun: water, dog rose (rosa canina) extract, beetroot (beta vulgaris) extract, glycerine, carrot (daucus carota sativa) root extract, tocopheryl acetate (vitamin E), methylcellulose, blue agave (agave tequilana) nectar, potassium sorbate, maltodextrin, citric acid, CI 77891, CI 45410.

Joy: water, rosehip (rosa rubiginosa) oil, glycerin, beetroot (rosa rubiginosa) extract, tocopherol (vitamin E), methylcellulose, blue agave (agave tequilana) nectar, potassium sorbate.

Directions

Apply to a clean face or over foundation on lips + cheek areas. With the applicator, apply a small amount to the apple of the cheek. Blend in tint with Ere Perez's eco vegan multipurpose brush. For a deeper red, reapply another layer and blend well. Apply to lips in the same way – either over the whole lip area or just in the centre of top and bottom lips. Then blend for your desired color. Apply extra layers for a deeper shade.

entry.title: Plum Rosy Lip + Cheek Stain
entry.summary:
Vendor: Captain Blankenship
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 16.00

A subtle plum lip and cheek stain that moisturizes with organic jojoba oil, organic almond oil and organic shea butter. Your lips will sing with the uplifting floral scent of organic rose geranium, lavender and sweet orange essential oils.

• Made with organic and wild-harvested ingredients

• 100% All Natural & Non-GMO

• Cruelty-free

• .5 oz

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, aluminum, lead, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, synthetic fragrances, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Organic Almond Oil, Beeswax, Organic Jojoba Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Wild-harvested Alkanet Root, and Organic Essential Oils of Rose Geranium, Lavender and Sweet Orange.

Directions

Dab onto lip and cheeks for hydration and color.

entry.title: Maiden Fern Blushing Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Living Libations
Type: Makeup
Price: 30.00

Living Libations’ Maiden Fern Blushing Balm is an innovative blush made from warming botanicals that naturally increase circulation to the cheeks and lips, delivering a playful, rosy hue where you need it most. This lovely tint has been enriched with extractions of juicy roots, replenishing seabuckthorn berries, and special essential oils to create a warm, rosy hue that is gorgeous on any skin tone.

• 5 ml / 0.17 oz

Made WITHOUT Artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Golden Jojoba, Seabuckthorn Berry, Beeswax, Stone Root, Rose Otto, Neroli, Lavender, Immortelle, Carrot, Ginger, Cinnamon, Peppermint, Cayenne, and Turmeric Essential Oils.

Directions

Dab a dollop of our blushing balm onto cheekbones, or add a pinch to upper and lower lips.
